Title: Gardus Steel Soul
Legend: Gardus Steel Soul is the most revered Lord-Celestant of the Hallowed Knights and a veritable beacon of hope. In battle, he focuses his faith as a weapon to safeguard the innocent and smite Sigmar’s enemies.
Intro: Gardus Steel Soul is armed with a Sigmarite Warcloak and a Sigmarite Runeblade and Warhammer.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Lords of the Exemplar Chamber • Lords of the Harbinger Chamber • Lords of the Warrior Chamber

Rules.Name: Aura Of Purity
Rules.Fluff: Gardus' faith is so strong that even Nurgle's garden was unable to corrupt him.
Rules.Rule: Aura of Purity: Friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS units wholly within 12" of this unit have a ward of 5+.

Rules.Name: Martyr’s Strength
Rules.Fluff: The Hallowed Knights will not fall until their foe is slain.
Rules.Rule: Roll a dice if this unit is destroyed in the combat phase. On a 2+, this unit can fight before it is removed from play.

Rules.Name: Saintly Assault
Rules.Fluff: Calling upon the celestial grace of Sigmar, the lords of the Steel Souls engage the foe with zealous wrath.
Rules.Rule: Once per battle, at the start of your charge phase, you can declare a saintly assault. If you do so, until the end of that turn, you can re-roll charge rolls for friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS units wholly within 12" of this unit and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly HALLOWED KNIGHTS HEROES wholly within 12" of this unit.
